page.title: 08Trimpley Village Hall Clubs
page.content: {Women's Institute}With 50 members, the Trimpley branch of this influential national organisation meets on the 2nd Tuesday each month.At each meeting there is a speaker on one of a variety of subjects, social time and a cup of tea or coffee. Other activities include competitions, craft demonstrations and outings, as well as discussion of important issues. {Men's Club}With 40 members, the club rents one of the 2 large rooms and meets every Monday.There is a licensed bar, full-sized Billiard and Pool tables and Darts. Once a month a social evening is open to wives and friends.Recently Â£16,000 was spent on the club during refurbishment of the hall, funds being raised locally. {Keep fit}sessions are held on Thursday evenings. {Other events}are held regularly.
